page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES, HARROW.
page.content:
The most popular team game for boys is{football;}most girls like to play {netball}or{hockey.}In Summer, some children like to play{cricket}or {rounders}or go{swimming.}Many schools have teams for their best players and matches or galas are arranged between different schools.
At school play-time, children play games like{Skipping, Throwing and {Catching, Chainy, Off-ground Touch, {Had, Pompom}and{Skittles. { Pompom}is a street game in which the counter counts up to 50 and the others hide and attempt to get Home before the counter finds them and shouts "Pompom" at the post. { Skittles}is where children line up along a wall and have to dodge tennis balls which other children throw at them.
